summary: Small immersion mod that lets innkeepers get some well deserved rest.
descriptionHtml:
[img]http://i.imgur.com/vrgqzdL.png[/img]

1. [b]Description[/b]
2. [b]Installation[/b]
3. [b]Compatibility[/b]
4. [b]Credits[/b]

1. [color=#0d94ac][b]Description[/b][/color]

Innkeepers aren't dwemer robots, they need sleep like everyone else.

Each night innkeepers all over Skyrim will get some sleep on the bedroll by their post, allowing them to still serve any late night customers who come in.

Due to the nature of their job, they usually sleep from the early hours of morning until sunrise.

2. [color=#0d94ac][b]Installation[/b][/color]

Drop Sleeping Innkeepers.esp into your Skyrim Data folder. I recommend doing this with your favorite mod manager.

3. [color=#0d94ac][b]Compatibility[/b][/color]

USKP fixes have been imported into the mod where appropriate.
Won't be compatible with mods that edit the actor records of innkeepers in Skyrim or which replace innkeepers with new actors.

4. [color=#0d94ac][b]Credits[/b][/color]

Made at the request of someone I miss greatly.
author: SilentSpike

files.name: Sleeping Innkeepers
files.changelogHtml:
Removed a wild edit or two
Carried forward some very minor USKP changes I missed
